name: speech-native-client
description: Notice: This project is work in progress.

scripts.watch: concurrent "npm run watch:haxe" "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:node"
scripts.release:css: npm run build:css && cleancss --skip-rebase -o dist/src/style.css src/style.css
scripts.release:build: npm run release:clean && npm run release:copy && npm run release:haxe && npm run release:css
scripts.release:pack-win: electron-packager ./dist/src Speech --out=dist/bin --cache=dist/cache --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=0.34.3 --overwrite --asar --icon=res/app.ico --version-string.CompanyName="Seibe TAKAHASHI" --version-string.LegalCopyright="Copylight (C) Seibe TAKAHASHI, All right reserved." --version-string.FileDescription="Speech native application" --version-string.OriginalFilename="Speech.exe" --version-string.FileVersion="1.0.0" --version-string.ProductVersion="1.0.0" --version-string.ProductName="Speech" --version-string.InternalName="Speech"
scripts.release:pack: npm run release:pack-win && npm run release:pack-osx
scripts.release:win: npm run release:build && npm run release:pack-win && npm run release:installer-win

author: seibe
